io.odysz.semantic.jserv.R

Class QueryReq

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.odysz.semantic.jprotocol.JBody
      • io.odysz.semantic.jserv.R.QueryReq

  • public class QueryReq
extends JBody
    query-obj: { tabl: tabl-obj,
                         joins: [join-obj],
             exprs: [expr-obj],
             where: [cond-obj],
             orders: [order-obj],
             group: [group-obj]
           }
     - tabl-obj: {tabl: "table-1", as: "t_alais"}
     - join-obj: [{t: "j/r/l", tabl: "table-1", as: "t_alais", on: conds}]
           - conds: [cond-obj]
                cond-obj: {(main-table | alais .)left-col-val op (table-1 | alias2 .)right-col-val}
                                        - op: '=' | '<=' | '>=' ...
     - expr-obj: {tabl: "b_articles/t_alais", alais: "recId", expr: "recId"}
     - order-obj: {tabl: "b_articles", field: "pubDate", asc: "true"}
     - group-obj: {tabl: "b_articles/t_alais", expr: "recId" }

respons:
{total: num, rows[]}
or
{code: "failed", msg: msg}
    Author:
    ody

        public static QueryReq formatReq(JMessage<QueryReq> parent,
                                 io.odysz.semantics.SemanticObject ssInf,
                                 java.lang.String from,

        Create a qeury request body item, for joining etc., and can be serialized into json by toJson(JsonWriter).

        Client side helper, don't confused with Query.
